```py
>>> ser = pd.Series([390., 350., 357., np.nan, 22., 20., 30.],
...                 index=['Falcon', 'Falcon', 'Falcon', 'Falcon',
...                        'Parrot', 'Parrot', 'Parrot'],
...                 name="Max Speed")
>>> ser
Falcon    390.0
Falcon    350.0
Falcon    357.0
Falcon      NaN
Parrot     22.0
Parrot     20.0
Parrot     30.0
Name: Max Speed, dtype: float64
>>> ser.groupby(level=0).skew()
Falcon    1.525174
Parrot    1.457863
Name: Max Speed, dtype: float64
>>> ser.groupby(level=0).skew(skipna=False)
Falcon         NaN
Parrot    1.457863
Name: Max Speed, dtype: float64
```
